message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SP, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.MM. 

The paper deals with the problem of perfect reconstruction in multichannel systems using short FIR filters. This problem is related to information theory (cs.IT) and signal processing (cs.SP). The paper also provides necessary and sufficient conditions for perfect reconstruction, which involves mathematical analysis and optimization, making it relevant to machine learning (cs.LG) and statistics (cs.SI). Finally, the paper discusses potential applications in blind signal reconstruction, which falls under multimedia (cs.MM).
